International Festival
The local Chamber of Commerce is reviewing proposals for an international festival to be held in the City. There are many different options, and they are asking which one you prefer.
Definitely an international movie festival. Lights! Camera! Action!
The City enters a WLTKD for 10 turns and gains {2_InstantYield}.

All you need is love. We don't really care about money because money cannot buy us love. We can take a sad song and make it better. Maybe we can get high with a little help from our friends with a music festival.
The City gains {4_GPChange}.
I would recommend a Symposium of the Future. Let's see these new inventions and wander through the House of Tomorrow.
Merchants and Engineers in the City gain +3 [ICON_RESEARCH] for {5_Turns}.
Everyone loves Sportball. We should host World Sportball Championship and crown a winner!
You gain {1_YieldCost} with all known Civilizations and {2_InstantYield}.

Béchamel, Velouté, Espagnole, Hollandaise, and Tomato. Yes...I'm talking about an international food festival. Someone get me a plate of curried ribs covered in sauerkraut and a glass of artisanal beer

Art Forgery

New, 'non-destructive' analysis is all the rage in our galleries. Unfortunately, our Cultural Advisor believes at least one of our paintings is, in fact, a fake.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]They are going to find out...
This is going to severely damage the reputation of the City's Artists' Guild...
Lose {3_GPChange}.
Oh well. Isn't all art a lie?
